blackrockshooter:Burst_Shot.NAME: Burst Shot
blackrockshooter:Burst_Shot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Deals additional !M! damage for each attack played this turn.

blackrockshooter:Charge_Shot.NAME: Charge Shot
blackrockshooter:Charge_Shot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Deals additional !M! damage for each attack played this turn.

blackrockshooter:Star_Shot.NAME: Star Shot
blackrockshooter:Star_Shot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Deals additional !M! damage for each attack played this combat.

blackrockshooter:Explosive_Shot.NAME: Explosive Shot
blackrockshooter:Explosive_Shot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Add a Burn into your discard pile.

blackrockshooter:Discern.NAME: Discern
blackrockshooter:Discern.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

blackrockshooter:Bargain.NAME: Bargain
blackrockshooter:Bargain.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.
blackrockshooter:Bargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

blackrockshooter:Outrage.NAME: Outrage
blackrockshooter:Outrage.DESCRIPTION: Enter blackrockshooter:Aggressor. NL At the end of your turn, become Confused.

blackrockshooter:Perforate.NAME: Perforate
blackrockshooter:Perforate.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! blackrockshooter:Bleed. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Menacing_Aura.NAME: Menacing Aura
blackrockshooter:Menacing_Aura.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose X Strength. NL Apply blackrockshooter:Slow to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
blackrockshooter:Menacing_Aura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose X+1 Strength. NL Apply blackrockshooter:Slow to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Psychotic_Power.NAME: Psychotic Power
blackrockshooter:Psychotic_Power.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain [E] and lose 1 HP.

blackrockshooter:Demonic_Power.NAME: Demonic Power
blackrockshooter:Demonic_Power.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, gain !M! Strength.
blackrockshooter:Demonic_Power.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Whenever you play an attack, gain !M! Strength.

blackrockshooter:Necrotic_Power.NAME: Necrotic Power
blackrockshooter:Necrotic_Power.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.
blackrockshooter:Necrotic_Power.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

blackrockshooter:Blue_Aura.NAME: Blue Aura
blackrockshooter:Blue_Aura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, deals !M! damage back and gain 1 Strength.

blackrockshooter:Stat_Boost.NAME: Stat Boost
blackrockshooter:Stat_Boost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Add a copy of this card to your hand.

blackrockshooter:Open_Fire.NAME: Open Fire
blackrockshooter:Open_Fire.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Charge.NAME: Charge
blackrockshooter:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If this is the first attack you played this turn, draw !M! card.
blackrockshooter:Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If this is the first attack you played this turn, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

blackrockshooter:Evade.NAME: Evade
blackrockshooter:Evade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

blackrockshooter:Unreal_Motion.NAME: Unreal Motion
blackrockshooter:Unreal_Motion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns.

blackrockshooter:Duck.NAME: Duck
blackrockshooter:Duck.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Dexterity.

blackrockshooter:Backstep.NAME: Backstep
blackrockshooter:Backstep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Auto *Attack to your hand.

blackrockshooter:Parry.NAME: Parry
blackrockshooter:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.
blackrockshooter:Parry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Rest.NAME: Rest
blackrockshooter:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Heal 50% of max HP. NL Gain !M! blackrockshooter:Sleep. NL End your turn. NL Remove this card from your deck.
blackrockshooter:Rest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Heal all of max HP. NL Gain !M! blackrockshooter:Sleep. NL End your turn. NL Remove this card from your deck.

blackrockshooter:Pursue.NAME: Pursue
blackrockshooter:Pursue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

blackrockshooter:Repel.NAME: Repel
blackrockshooter:Repel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies twice.

blackrockshooter:Photon_Shower.NAME: Photon Shower
blackrockshooter:Photon_Shower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Stun_Snipe.NAME: Stun Snipe
blackrockshooter:Stun_Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply 1 blackrockshooter:Stunned. NL Apply !M! *Plated *Armour. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Jump_Shot.NAME: Jump Shot
blackrockshooter:Jump_Shot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card.

blackrockshooter:Execute.NAME: Execute
blackrockshooter:Execute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! % of max HP. NL If Fatal, permanently increase this card's damage by !M! %. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Treasure_Hunt.NAME: Treasure Hunt
blackrockshooter:Treasure_Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Enemy doubles max HP. NL When the enemy dies, gain gold equal to half its max HP. NL Exhaust.
blackrockshooter:Treasure_Hunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enemy doubles max HP. NL When the enemy dies, gain gold equal to half its max HP. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Madness_Rain.NAME: Rain of Madness
blackrockshooter:Madness_Rain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies 2X times. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Whack.NAME: Whack
blackrockshooter:Whack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !M! Strength.

blackrockshooter:Over_Limit.NAME: Over Limit
blackrockshooter:Over_Limit.DESCRIPTION: Your next X attacks cost zero. NL Exhaust.
blackrockshooter:Over_Limit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next X attacks cost zero.

blackrockshooter:Rapid_Cannon.NAME: Rapid Cannon
blackrockshooter:Rapid_Cannon.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Add !M! *Auto *Attack to your hand.

blackrockshooter:Vortex_Cannon.NAME: Vortex Cannon
blackrockshooter:Vortex_Cannon.DESCRIPTION: Fill the rest of your hand with *Auto *Attack.
blackrockshooter:Vortex_Cannon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill the rest of your hand with *Auto *Attack+.

blackrockshooter:Auto_Reloader.NAME: Auto Reloader
blackrockshooter:Auto_Reloader.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *Auto *Attack to your hand.
blackrockshooter:Auto_Reloader.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an *Auto *Attack to your hand.

blackrockshooter:Endure_no_Pain.NAME: Endure no Pain
blackrockshooter:Endure_no_Pain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

blackrockshooter:Keep_Firing.NAME: Keep Firing
blackrockshooter:Keep_Firing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Whenever a card is Exhausted this turn, returns this from the discard pile to your hand.

blackrockshooter:BB_Genocide.NAME: BB Genocide
blackrockshooter:BB_Genocide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies 3 times. NL Any blackrockshooter:Bleed stacks become 10, otherwise Apply 3 blackrockshooter:Bleed.

blackrockshooter:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
blackrockshooter:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: Every 3 times you gain Block, gain !M! Dexterity.

blackrockshooter:Unrelenting_Fury.NAME: Unrelenting Fury
blackrockshooter:Unrelenting_Fury.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack this turn, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

blackrockshooter:Attack_Trail.NAME: Attack Trail
blackrockshooter:Attack_Trail.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack this turn, gain !M! Block.

blackrockshooter:Lethal_Blast.NAME: Lethal Blast
blackrockshooter:Lethal_Blast.DESCRIPTION: Double Poison on ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
blackrockshooter:Lethal_Blast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple Poison on ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Noxious_Horde.NAME: Noxious Horde
blackrockshooter:Noxious_Horde.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain 2 Orb slots.

blackrockshooter:Seeing_Everything.NAME: Seeing Everything
blackrockshooter:Seeing_Everything.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
blackrockshooter:Seeing_Everything.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Gain [E] for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Tactical_Manoeuvre.NAME: Tactical Manoeuvre
blackrockshooter:Tactical_Manoeuvre.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, Upgrade ALL other cards in your hand for the rest of combat and Exhaust.
blackrockshooter:Tactical_Manoeuvre.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, Upgrade ALL other cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

blackrockshooter:Rehabilitate.NAME: Rehabilitate
blackrockshooter:Rehabilitate.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is Exhausted, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards.
blackrockshooter:Rehabilitate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is Exhausted, gain [E] [E] [E] and draw !M! cards.

blackrockshooter:React.NAME: React
blackrockshooter:React.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Dexterity. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !M! Strength.

blackrockshooter:Double_Team.NAME: Double Team
blackrockshooter:Double_Team.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next card is played twice.
blackrockshooter:Double_Team.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! cards are played twice.

blackrockshooter:Obliteration_Cannon.NAME: Obliteration Cannon
blackrockshooter:Obliteration_Cannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each card in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

blackrockshooter:Rapid_Strike.NAME: Rapid Strike
blackrockshooter:Rapid_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! Damage 5 times. NL Damage is not affected by Strength.

blackrockshooter:Fade_Away.NAME: Fade Away
blackrockshooter:Fade_Away.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! block 5 times. NL Block is not affected by Dexterity.

blackrockshooter:Dark_Beam.NAME: Dark Beam
blackrockshooter:Dark_Beam.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Apply !M! blackrockshooter:Bleed.

blackrockshooter:Blazing_Trail.NAME: Blazing Trail
blackrockshooter:Blazing_Trail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Whenever you play an attack this turn, draw 1 card.
